places.name: Central Park Dog Run
places.address: Central Park West & 69th Street, New York, NY 10023
places.description: Large fenced off-leash area in Central Park with separate sections for large and small dogs, plus water fountains.
places.descriptionFr: Grande zone clôturée sans laisse dans Central Park avec des sections séparées pour les grands et petits chiens, plus des fontaines à eau.
places.reasoning: Central Parks official dog run is well-documented and maintained by NYC Parks
